plot: Set in an underground dungeon inhabited by bundled, ragged human beings, after the nuclear holocaust. The story follows the wanderings of a hero through the situations of survival. People wait for the Ark to arrive and rescue them while their habitat falls apart.   Written by  Polish Cinema Database
title: O-bi, O-ba - Koniec cywilizacji
